title: Requires orders of protection issued in family court or in cases of family offenses in criminal court to be translated into the native language of the parties
summary: Requires orders of protection and temporary orders of protection issued in family court or in cases of family offenses in criminal court to be translated by an interpreter into the native language of the parties.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act and the criminal procedure law, in relation to the duties of interpreters appointed by the courts in certain cases
